sentences.en: "I've got his card." Judith said, handing it over.
sentences.cn: “我有他的名片，”朱迪丝边说边把名片递了过来。

sentences.en: a piece of card
sentences.cn: 一张卡片纸

sentences.en: a tough negotiator who had a number of cards up his sleeve.
sentences.cn: 一个拥有很多锦囊妙计的难以对付的谈判者

sentences.en: Andre Agassi accepted a wild card to play in the Stockholm Open.
sentences.cn: 安德烈·阿加西持外卡参加了斯德哥尔摩公开赛。

sentences.en: Check the numbers below against the numbers on your card.
sentences.cn: 把下列数字和你卡片上的数字比照一下。

sentences.en: Come on, Bill. Send Tom a card and make his day.
sentences.cn: 来吧，比尔。给汤姆寄张卡片让他高兴高兴吧。

sentences.en: Employees must show their identity cards at the gate.
sentences.cn: 雇员在大门口必须出示自己的身份卡。

sentences.en: he saw an opportunity to play the peace card.
sentences.cn: 他看到了一次打和平牌的机会。

sentences.en: He sent a basket of exotic fruit and a card.
sentences.cn: 他送了一篮子异域水果和一张卡片。

sentences.en: He will now fight Kevin Ford on the five-bout card.
sentences.cn: 他将在五局制比赛中迎战凯文·福特。

sentences.en: Here's my card. You know where to find me.
sentences.cn: 这是我的名片。你知道哪里能找到我。

sentences.en: I haven’t got my membership card yet.
sentences.cn: 我还没拿到会员卡。

sentences.en: Make a note of credit card numbers and check expiry dates.
sentences.cn: 记下信用卡卡号，核对有效期限。

sentences.en: My name’s Adam Carver. Here’s my card.
sentences.cn: 我叫亚当•卡弗，这是我的名片。

sentences.en: My promotion to a higher position just isn't in the cards.
sentences.cn: 我的职位很可能不会提升了

sentences.en: our marriage has been on the cards from day one.
sentences.cn: 我们从一开始就有结婚的可能。

sentences.en: Send your details on a card to the following address.
sentences.cn: 在明信片上写明你的近况寄到下面的地址。

sentences.en: She put the pieces of card in her pocket.
sentences.cn: 她把那些硬纸片放进了口袋。

sentences.en: The croupier dealt each player a card, face down.
sentences.cn: 赌台管理员给每位玩家正面朝下发了一张牌。

sentences.en: They also left a card, imprinted with the name Sean Lynch.
sentences.cn: 他们还留下了一张名片，上面印着肖恩·林奇的名字。

sentences.en: To make it easier to contact us, keep this card handy.
sentences.cn: 把这张卡放在手边，以便于和我们联系。

sentences.en: Using a credit card to pay for an order is simplicity itself.
sentences.cn: 用信用卡支付订单再简单不过了。

sentences.en: You are protected instantly if a thief misuses your credit card.
sentences.cn: 如果小偷盗用你的信用卡，你的卡会立即受到保护。

phrases.tran_cn: (英)必要时才公开的计划（或优势）；锦囊妙计
签到：如在商业场所用磁卡所进行的登记
签退：用磁卡登记姓名以示离开，如离开商业活动的场所时
有锦囊妙计：有所保留的，秘而不宣的谋略或计划
（美）绿卡（指允许外国人进入美国工作的绿色许可证）；（英）绿色保险证
处于非常强势（或有利）的位置
很可能或一定会发生的
（尤指为政治利益而）利用某问题（或观点），打…牌

phrases.phrase: put (one's) cards on the table 或 lay (one's) cards on the table
phrases.tran_cn: 摊牌：把自己的动机或意图坦白明了地公布出来

phrases.phrase: put (或 lay) one's cards on the table
phrases.tran_cn: 坦陈（某人的办法、意图或态度），摊牌

trans.tran_cn: 卡，纸牌，（身份）证，明信片，优势
trans.tran_en: a small piece of plastic or paper containing information about a person or showing, for example, that they belong to a particular organization, club etc
